name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny Tasks: a modern to-do list app

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny Tasks is a simple and fast to-do extension to help you stay organized.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Laundry lists can be overwhelming, so the main purpose of Tiny Tasks is to help you manage your day's tasks, one task at a time.

⚡️ FAST 🏃‍♀️ LIGHTWEIGHT ✌️ MODERN

✅ FEATURES 
📌 Side Panel (NEW!)
🎯 Focus mode
🖍️ Priority levels
♻️ Repeatable tasks
🗓️ Completed tasks by date
😶‍🌫️ Show/hide completed tasks
👀 Show/hide badge count
🌌 Dark mode
📆 Today's date
🗂️ Export tasks
🔗 Links

📮 You can request features by sending an email to tinylabs@duck.com
☕️ You can support the extension development at https://www.buymeacoffee.com/tinylabs
